xpr8oDD70avxJKj6GRyP.ingredients: #Chicken<SEP>1.2-1.6 lb chicken thigh fillets, breast, or pork, beef, seafood<SEP>2 garlic gloves, finely chopped or minced<SEP>2 T. lime juice<SEP>1 T. soy sauce<SEP>2 T. brown sugar<SEP>1 T. vegetable oil<SEP>1 stalk lemongrass, white part only bruised then sliced into pieces easy to pick out later<SEP><SEP>#Nuoc Cham sauce<SEP>1/4 c. fish sauce<SEP>4 T. rice vinegar<SEP>2 T. white sugar<SEP>1/2 c. water<SEP>2 garlic cloves, finely chopped<SEP>1 red birdseye chili, finely chopped<SEP>3 T. lime juice<SEP><SEP>#Noodle bowl<SEP>1 T. oil<SEP>7 oz. vermicelli noodles, dried<SEP>2 carrots, julienned<SEP>2 cucumbers, julienned<SEP>5 c. romaine lettuce, finely sliced<SEP>3 c. bean sprouts<SEP>Handful of mint leaves<SEP>Handful of cilantro/coriander<SEP>Sliced chili (for garnish-optional)<SEP>Lime wedges (to serve-optional)

xuhrlPmOkmMEMK6IhkI6.directions: Pour the vegetable oil into the bottom of a slow cooker. Place the pork roast into the slow cooker; pour in the barbecue sauce, apple cider vinegar, and chicken broth. Stir in the brown sugar, yellow mustard, Worcestershire sauce, chili powder, onion, garlic, and thyme. Cover and cook on High until the roast shreds easily with a fork, 5 to 6 hours (or low for 10-12 hours).<SEP>Remove the roast from the slow cooker, and shred the meat using two forks. Return the shredded pork to the slow cooker, and stir the meat into the juices.<SEP>Spread the inside of both halves of hamburger buns with butter. Toast the buns, butter side down, in a skillet over medium heat until golden brown. Spoon pork into the toasted buns.
xuhrlPmOkmMEMK6IhkI6.ingredients: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil<SEP>1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast<SEP>1 cup barbeque sauce<SEP>½ cup apple cider vinegar<SEP>½ cup chicken broth<SEP>¼ cup light brown sugar  <SEP>1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard<SEP>1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce<SEP>1 tablespoon chili powder<SEP>1 extra large onion, chopped  <SEP>2 large cloves garlic, crushed<SEP>1 ½ teaspoons dried thyme<SEP>8 hamburger buns, split<SEP>2 tablespoons butter, or as needed
xuhrlPmOkmMEMK6IhkI6.name: Texas Pulled Pork

xwJqLFOZ8DeWTe7Uqeii.ingredients: 1/2 cup fine bulgur<SEP>3 tablespoons olive oil<SEP>1 cup boiling-hot water<SEP>2 cups finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley (from 3 bunches)<SEP>1/2 cup finely chopped fresh mint<SEP>2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/4-inch pieces<SEP>1/2 seedless cucumber, peeled, cored, and cut into 1/4-inch pieces<SEP>3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice<SEP>3/4 teaspoon salt<SEP>1/4 teaspoon black pepper
xwJqLFOZ8DeWTe7Uqeii.name: Tabbouleh
xwJqLFOZ8DeWTe7Uqeii.directions: Stir together bulgur and 1 tablespoon oil in a heatproof bowl. Pour boiling water over, then cover bowl tightly with plastic wrap and let stand 15 minutes. Drain in a sieve, pressing on bulgur to remove any excess liquid.<SEP>Transfer bulgur to a bowl and toss with remaining ingredients, including 2 tablespoons oil, until combined well.

xwmxPaHud3HtOb32qocW.name: Crispy Crack Cookies
xwmxPaHud3HtOb32qocW.notes: They will puff up, but be patient - they flatten out and turn brown. This happens pretty quick so keep an eye on them! I found that they weren't as crispy as I liked unless I over-cooked them. They will be quite brown.
xwmxPaHud3HtOb32qocW.directions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Line large baking sheets with parchment paper.<SEP>In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.<SEP>In a large bowl, vigorously beat the butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and corn syrup with a spatula until very well combined. Add the egg, milk, and vanilla and beat vigorously until very well combined. Gradually add the flour mixture and stir until just combined, being careful not to over-mix. Gently stir in the chocolate chips. The dough will be very loose, sticky, and more like batter in consistency.<SEP>Drop dough by 1 1/2 tablespoon rounds onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing at least 2 inches apart. Don't worry if the dough isn't perfectly round. Bake for about 12 minutes, or until golden brown and flat, rotating the sheets halfway through baking. Bake one sheet at a time for even cooking.<SEP>Let the cookies cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before using a thin spatula to remove to wire racks to cool completely. Store in an airtight container for up to 5 days at room temperature. If desired, reheat the cookies in a 350°F oven for 3 to 5 minutes, or until warmed through.
xwmxPaHud3HtOb32qocW.ingredients: 1 1/3 cups (169 grams) all purpose flour (measured correctly!)<SEP>1/2 teaspoon baking soda<SEP>1/4 teaspoon salt<SEP>1 stick unsalted butter, melted and cooled<SEP>1/2 cup granulated sugar<SEP>1/3 cup packed light brown sugar<SEP>2 tablespoons light corn syrup or golden syrup<SEP>1 large egg<SEP>1 tablespoon milk (any kind)<SEP>2 teaspoons vanilla extract<SEP>1 cup semisweet chocolate chips

yEzufyZgNPefp9zEjFg1.directions: Heat oil in saucepan over medium heat. Add ground chicken and cook until browned, 3-5 minutes.<SEP>Stir in garlic, onion, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, rice wine vinegar, ginger, and Sriracha. Cook until onions are translucent, about 2 minutes.<SEP>Stir in water chestnuts, green onions, and carrot. Cook until tender, about 1-2 more minutes.<SEP>In a small bowl, whisk cornstarch into water until combined. Stir into filling mixture and cook to thicken.<SEP>To serve, spoon 2 tablespoons of chicken mixture into center of each lettuce leaf, taco-style.
yEzufyZgNPefp9zEjFg1.name: Lettuce Wraps
yEzufyZgNPefp9zEjFg1.ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil<SEP>1 pound ground chicken<SEP>2 cloves garlic, minced<SEP>1 onion, diced<SEP>1/4 cup hoisin sauce<SEP>1 tablespoon soy sauce<SEP>2 tablespoons teriyaki sauce<SEP>1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar<SEP>1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger<SEP>1 teaspoon Sriracha sauce<SEP>1 (8 ounce) can whole water chestnuts, drained and diced<SEP>2 green onions, thinly sliced<SEP>1 carrot, peeled and shredded<SEP>1 tablespoon cornstarch<SEP>2 tablespoons cold tap water<SEP>1 head butter lettuce, leaves separated and washed

yFO1tp8ZJNI6lmRnu8sw.name: Garlic Smashed Potatoes
yFO1tp8ZJNI6lmRnu8sw.directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Lightly oil a baking sheet or coat with nonstick spray.<SEP>In a large pot of boiling water, cook potatoes until tender, about 15-20 minutes; drain well.<SEP>Place potatoes onto the prepared baking sheet. Using a potato masher or fork, carefully smash the potatoes until flattened but still in one piece. Top with olive oil, garlic and thyme.<SEP>Place into oven and bake for 18-20 minutes, or until golden brown and crisp.<SEP>Serve immediately.
yFO1tp8ZJNI6lmRnu8sw.ingredients: 24 ounces Dutch yellow baby potatoes<SEP>2 tablespoons olive oil<SEP>3 cloves garlic, pressed<SEP>1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves<SEP>Kosher salt and freshly  ground black pepper, to taste

ykw9Q6gFbWNUd12uRxU8.name: Chocolate Bundt Cake
ykw9Q6gFbWNUd12uRxU8.directions: Heat oven to 350<SEP>Mix and bake in a greased bundt pan<SEP>Bake for 45-50 minutes<SEP><SEP>#Glaze:<SEP>Place the chocolate in a medium heatproof bowl.<SEP>In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, bring the cream, sugar, and vanilla to just below a boil, stirring frequently. <SEP>Take the pan off the heat and pour about 1/2 of the hot cream mixture over the chocolate. <SEP>Stir gently with a spatula until blended. <SEP>Add the rest of the hot cream mixture, stirring gently until the chocolate melts completely, about 5 minutes.<SEP>Immediately scrape the glaze into a small heatproof pitcher and pour it over the cake, letting it drip down the sides.
ykw9Q6gFbWNUd12uRxU8.ingredients: 1 Chocolate Cake Mix<SEP>1 Sm. Package Jello Instant Pudding (3.9 oz.)<SEP>1 Sm. Sour Cream (1 C.)<SEP>1/2 C. Warm Water<SEP>1/2 C. Oil<SEP>3 Eggs<SEP>Chocolate Chips<SEP><SEP>#Chocolate Glaze:<SEP>5 oz. Bittersweet Chocolate (70% cacao), coarsely chopped<SEP>3/4 C. Heavy Cream<SEP>2 Tbsp. Granulated Sugar<SEP>1 tsp. Vanilla Extract

yoAFSjIhmBuOZVjBnVgm.directions: In a large bowl, cream 1 1/3 cups sugar with 1/2 cup butter or margarine, and salt. Blend extract, 2 tablespoons milk, and remaining sugar into mixture. Gradually stir remaining milk into frosting until desired spreading consistency is reached.<SEP>Melt and stir unsweetened chocolate and 2 tablespoons butter or margarine together in a microwave, or in a double boiler. Double this glaze if desired.<SEP>Frost cake. Pipe a frosting scallop at the top edge of the cake to keep glaze from dripping down the sides of the cake. Pour the glaze over the top of the cake. Chill until glaze has set.
yoAFSjIhmBuOZVjBnVgm.ingredients: 4 cups confectioners' sugar<SEP>½ cup butter, softened  <SEP>⅛ teaspoon salt<SEP>1 teaspoon mint extract<SEP>4 tablespoons milk  <SEP>2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate<SEP>2 tablespoons butter
yoAFSjIhmBuOZVjBnVgm.name: Mint Buttercream Frosting with Dark Chocolate Glaze

z5ZwLBmJ3SjtlK6BrV36.ingredients: 1/2 cup boiling water<SEP>1 package (3 oz.) raspberry Jell-O<SEP>1 cup sugar<SEP>Ice to equal 1 cup<SEP>1 cup whipping cream<SEP>1 cup raspberries<SEP>1 can (6 oz) evaporated milk<SEP>1 3/4 to 2 cups milk
z5ZwLBmJ3SjtlK6BrV36.name: Raspberry Ice Cream
z5ZwLBmJ3SjtlK6BrV36.directions: Use a 2-cup glass liquid measuring cup to boil 1/2 cup water in the microwave-this only takes about 1 minute.<SEP>Dissolve raspberry Jell-O and sugar into the 1/2 cup boiling water.<SEP>Add ice cubes into the measuring cup until the total volume increases by 1 cup. Pour into blender and blend<SEP>until ice is dissolved. <SEP>Add whipping cream, raspberries, evaporated milk, and milk.<SEP>Pour into ice cream maker, and begin churning.<SEP>Pour into container and freeze until desired firmness.

zOK7VKbPQlYPUkm04R4b.directions: Place chicken and half of dressing in a resealable plastic bag (reserve remaining dressing). Marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes (or refrigerate up to overnight).<SEP>In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook noodles until tender. Drain, and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking. Transfer to a platter.<SEP>In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high. Working in batches, cook chicken (do not crowd skillet) until cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes; transfer to platter on top of noodles.<SEP>Top with carrots, cucumber, and basil. Drizzle with reserved dressing, and sprinkle with garnishes, if desired.<SEP>Mix dressing ingredients together.
zOK7VKbPQlYPUkm04R4b.name: Thai Chicken and Noodle Salad
zOK7VKbPQlYPUkm04R4b.ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced crosswise<SEP>Coarse salt<SEP>3 1/2 ounces Vermicelli noodles, broken in half if long<SEP>1 tablespoon vegetable oil, such as safflower<SEP>2 carrots, sliced into ribbons with a vegetable peeler<SEP>1 English cucumber, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise<SEP>1 cup sliced snow peas<SEP>1/4 cup fresh basil, torn<SEP>Bean sprouts,<SEP>chopped peanuts<SEP>fresh mint leaves<SEP>red-pepper flakes<SEP>sliced scallion greens<SEP><SEP>#Dressing<SEP>4 thinly sliced scallion whites<SEP>2 minced garlic cloves<SEP>1/2 cup soy sauce<SEP>1/2 cup rice vinegar<SEP>2 tablespoons light-brown sugar<SEP>1 tablespoon fresh lime juice<SEP>1/2 teaspoon red-pepper flakes

zQZwNaFogORk0ED0jqeo.ingredients: 1/2 tbs honey<SEP>1 c nonfat Greek yogurt<SEP>2 tbs light mayonnaise<SEP>2 tbs good quality curry powder, more or less to taste (I'm nuts for Dragunara)<SEP>1 lb raw chicken breast, poached and cubed<SEP>1/2 c shredded carrots<SEP>1/2 c raisins<SEP>2 scallions, chopped, whites discarded<SEP>1 stalk celery, minced<SEP>1/4 c sliced almonds<SEP>salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste (optional)
zQZwNaFogORk0ED0jqeo.name: Curried Chicken Salad
zQZwNaFogORk0ED0jqeo.directions: Whisk together honey, yogurt, mayonnaise, and curry powder in a small bowl and set aside. Season to taste with salt and pepper.<SEP>Combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl and stir in desired amount of dressing.

zSqqyGlm2Jg74i1qz4j0.name: Dessert Crepes
zSqqyGlm2Jg74i1qz4j0.directions: To make the filling, use the electric KitchenAid mixer with the wire whip attachment to combine sugar and cream cheese. Whip thoroughly until smooth.<SEP>Add sour cream and vanilla. Whip until light, fluffy, and fully combined. You will need to pause periodically to scrape down the sides of the bowl using a rubber scraper until no lumps remain. Place in a small serving bowl.<SEP>To make the topping, melt butter in a microwave-safe dish.<SEP>Pour heavy cream into a 2-cup microwave-safe liquid measuring cup and warm in the microwave for 1 minute.<SEP>Add chocolate morsels and melted butter to cream. Stir vigorously with a wire whisk or fork until chocolate is thoroughly melted. <SEP>If necessary, return to microwave in 30-second increments to fully melt chocolate.<SEP>Add vanilla and continue stirring. Place in a small serving bowl.<SEP>To make the batter, place flour, eggs, milk, water, salt, oil, and vanilla in the blender. Blend for 30 seconds.<SEP>Stop and stir down the sides. Blend 30 to 60 more seconds, until smooth.<SEP>Cook crepes in a pan or griddle. Stir batter between making each crepe.<SEP>Spread 1 tablespoon of filling over the cooked crepe. Roll crepe and dust with powdered sugar or drizzle with<SEP>chocolate sauce.
zSqqyGlm2Jg74i1qz4j0.ingredients: #filling<SEP>1/2 cup sugar<SEP>1 (8 oz.) block of cream cheese, softened<SEP>3 tablespoons of sour cream<SEP>1 teaspoon of vanilla<SEP><SEP>#Topping<SEP>3 tablespoons butter, melted<SEP>3/4 cup heavy cream<SEP>1 1/3 cups of semisweet chocolate morsels<SEP>1/2 teaspoon vanilla<SEP><SEP>Batter<SEP>1 1/2 cups flour<SEP>3 eggs<SEP>3/4 cup milk<SEP>3/4 cup water<SEP>1/4 teaspoon salt<SEP>2 tablespoons canola oil<SEP>1/2 teaspoon vanilla

zXgZKw17uPO45YZFUpYZ.name: Blueberry Protein Pancakes
zXgZKw17uPO45YZFUpYZ.ingredients: 2 C. Rolled Oats<SEP>2 C. Cottage Cheese<SEP>1/2 C. Fresh Blueberries<SEP>4 Eggs<SEP>4 Egg Whites (1/2 C liquid egg whites)<SEP>Serve with whipped cream, syrup
zXgZKw17uPO45YZFUpYZ.directions: Add oats, cottage cheese, blueberries, eggs and egg whites to a blender, blend until smooth<SEP>Spray griddle with cooking spray<SEP>Pour 1/4 C. batter onto greased griddle, flip and cook
